name: Police Cars - coloring book
description: Children coloring book. In this book you and your child will learn the police cars around the world. Our paint will be of interest to adults and children. Just move your finder over the screen and beautifull images appear in you hands. The complexity of the task is tuned with width of the brush. That's why we believe that the game will be interesting personally for your child. And it helps your children to extend his or her motorics of hand. And many language texts extend his or her knowledges.The application is adapted to new iPadPro generation.
